I love it! It’s so stretchy and so so soft

I love the color and sizing was good, I will say I think the length of the top is a little longer then expected buts it’s still great quality and great basic to have in my closet and need in more colors and can make more outfits out of it.

This top is cute, but size down. I got a medium but I should have purchased a small. Even though it is stretchy material, it is still slightly big on me. It doesn’t give me that tight snatched look that I was going for.
Runs small. I exchanged the item for the next size up and it's still too small.

Thick, high quality fabric, not see through. Perfect length, very comfortable.

I love these so much that I just bought my third color. They are soft, flattering and don’t rise up throughout the day. The quality holds up after washing many times and is pretty resistant to wrinkling. Such a great basic.
Silky soft feel and fits amazing. Feels just like skims! I will be getting more colors asap.
Just what I was looking for! Very much a SKIMS dupe!

I want to really like these shirts, but I'm having a hard time. I love the stretchy material, but the armpit holes are too large and make funny shoulder puffs when I move my arms around. Made well and fits really good. Great staple piece!

I am 5'6", 34A, 26"-27" waist, 115-118 depending on the day. Wanted a basic long sleeve black top that was fitted but not too tight, that I could dress up or down. I normally wear a small or a medium in tops depending on the cut of the top and the look and feel I am going for. I ordered a medium, I knew I would be wearing this top with high waisted pants, so the torso length is perfect (not cropped) and I have a short torso. The arm length is good, goes down to my wrist (I do have long arms), and is not a super tight fit on the arms but not too loose on the arms either. Love the feel of the material and the look. I will be ordering a couple more colors.
Great quality and not see through.

Go for it! It hides and snatches in the right places, I bought two more after the first one, also keeps you warm enough for North Cal winters!! I love it! I'm 5'2, 170 pounds, and got XL for perfect fit.

I absolutely LOVE this black 2-piece set! It’s the perfect combination of comfort and versatility. The material is super comfy, making it ideal for lounging around the house, but it’s stylish enough to wear while traveling or running errands. The fit is flattering and feels so cozy that I even use it as pajamas on chill nights. This set has quickly become my go-to outfit for any relaxed occasion. Highly recommend if you’re looking for something that’s both comfortable and chic!

This long sleeve shirt is perfect for layering or wearing on its own! The fabric is super soft and breathable, so I don’t feel too hot or too cold, making it perfect for all seasons. I love the fit—it’s not too tight or too loose, and it has a flattering cut that works well with jeans, leggings, or even skirts.  The sleeves are just the right length, and the shirt holds up well after multiple washes without shrinking or losing its shape. It’s a great basic that I can dress up or down, and I’ve been wearing it constantly. Definitely a must-have for anyone looking for a comfortable, versatile piece to add to their wardrobe!
